thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: This is the only service I found to send both large and small amounts of money overseas. Their necessary followup to confirm identity and prevent money laundering as required by legislation was courteous and easy to comply with. Found my contact very helpful even though I was only transferring GBP10. Fees were reasonable and indeed, cheap for the quality of the service. Transfer was faster than the nominated times once I had completed my part of the requirements on my first transaction. Future transactions will be quite quick and I will not be looking elsewhere for this service.
